segments.text: You are seemingly upset . What's behind you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Arden wants to have a trademark for our new series of products registered . But I have no idea on the registering process .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not as complicated as you suppose .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it so easy ? I never experienced this . Can you tell me something about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is known that there is a time limit for trademarks . And we should not have a similar trademark with the one in the same field .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Based on what you said , does it mean that we can not have a trademark like ' genova ' , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Correct . And our country follows the priority of use principle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell something about the preparation for the register ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some relative documents will be needed and the fee may be quite dear . So you need to learn more about the process and regulations about this issue .
segments.speaker: S1
